summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4210 for the improvement of the alley in block 5, Laurelhurst Heights Addition, being the alley between 46th Avenue Northeast and 47th Avenue Northeast, from East 38th Street to East 40th Street; by grading and otherwise improving the same, under Ordinance No. 50071 and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
